page.title: 13Memorable Days
page.content:
Recreation The best day of my life was when I went to Alton Towers with the Brownies and Joanna's mum took us on the Log Flume Ride and I was scared. Wendy.
The day in my life came one day on holiday.It was in Wales. We had gone to Aberdaron. The waves were big. When we took our boats on the waves all we did was go up and down until a big wave came and knocked our boat over. Under we went but when it came up again we were still in the boat. Sam.
Local history In 1711 Dr Johnson was brought as an infant to be treated by Dr Thomas Attwood who specialised as an oculist.
